title: (x) Black Baby - ITC Avant Garde Extra Light Alternates {Colin}
content:
A mix of Avant Garde Extra light and Avant Garde Alt....   
But what it s the right name and designer???   
   
THANKS to help me. =^.^= ![a beautifull font....](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000348im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/15809.jpg)
author: weeliam

comments.content: Avant Garde Extra Light. Herb Lubalin. [Here are the Extra Light alternates.](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000348/http:/www.fontshop.com.au/fontdetailc.php3?ns=&sns=&co=&co2=&id=fp-2814&fsausess=e6bc588b68fdd93099ba51676f214ca3)
